articles.title: Mahindra Scorpio-N Adventure Edition Revealed - carandbike
articles.description: The Mahindra Scorpio-N Adventure Edition has been revealed in South Africa and brings a host of upgrades, including new bumpers, alloys, tyres, and more to give it a rugged look.
articles.content: Mahindra has showcased the new Scorpio-N Adventure Edition for the South African market, and the made-in-India SUV gets a new rugged look. The Mahindra Scorpio-N Adventure Edition was promised for So… [+1617 chars]
